message: Take this generous offer and we can both walk away with a good chunk of money!
You're going to regret rejecting my offer!
Let's meet in the middle and make a deal. It's getting late in the game!
You're getting desperate, I can tell!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting smart! Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Alice!
I'm not running out of time, I'm just getting bold! Take it or leave it, Bob!
You're really stretching it now, Alice!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make another move.
You're bluffing, Alice. I'm not afraid of your last stand!
I'm not bluffing, Bob. This is my last move. Take it or leave it.
